scripts.start: npm run create-folders && npm run scss && npm run move-css && npm run move-vendor && npm run build-site
scripts.move-vendor: cp node_modules/material-components-web/dist/material-components-web.min.css dist/css && cp node_modules/material-components-web/dist/material-components-web.js dist/scripts && cp styleguide-utils/scripts/vendor/run_prettify_html.js dist/scripts
scripts.move-css: cp build/css/main.css dist/css && cp styleguide-utils/css/styleguide.css dist/css
scripts.create-folders: rm -rf build/ && rm -rf dist/ && mkdir build && mkdir dist && mkdir build/css && mkdir build/html && mkdir dist/css && mkdir dist/scripts
